title: Max.Payne.3.Complete.Edition-RELOADED
description:
Max Payne 3 Complete Edition (c) Rockstar Games

10/2016 :..... RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION .......: Steam + SocialClub
      1 :.......... DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE ........: Action

No longer a New York City cop, Max Payne moves to So Paulo to protect a
wealthy family in an effort to finally escape his troubled past. Combining
cutting edge shooting mechanics with a dark and twisted story, Max Payne 3
is a seamless, highly detailed, cinematic experience from Rockstar Games.
The Complete Edition includes:
* Max Payne 3
* Deathmatch Made In Heaven Pack
* Painful Memories Pack
* Hostage Negotiation Pack
* Local Justice Pack
* Silent Killer Loadout Pack
* Cemetery Map
* Special Edition Pack
* Deadly Force Burst
* Pill Bottle Item

If you're having problem with Social Club, make sure that our crack isn't
being blocked by any lame AV or whatever. If you're still having problems,
you can install Social Club. With our crack, the game won't use it, so it
should not be necessary. Enjoy!

1. Unrar.
2. Burn or mount the image.
3. Install the game.
4. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to
your game install directory.
5. Play the game.
6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!
